messages.subject: family restrooms
messages.msgSnippet: I ve seen these also and I, too, think they re great! I ve also seen these in newer museums and the like. Nina -- Only the dreamer can change the dream.....
messages.messageBody:
I've seen these also and I, too, think they're great! I've also seen these
in newer museums and the like.

Nina

--
Only the dreamer can change the dream.....

>
> essage: 8
> Date: Fri, 13 Apr 2001 10:06:31 -0500
> From: "Tammy Graves" <tgraves@...>
> Subject: Re: age limits on restrooms
>
> More and more newer bathrooms found in malls and such are using the "family"
> bathroom. I think this is great! And its about time! My problem with this was
> that my then 4-5 yr old never wants to wait until the rest of us are finished,
> and is always trying to unlock the door. Therefore, my potty breaks have
> always
> been done as quickly as the consumption of my food during a lunch break. I
> only
> wish I had the energy level that kids do.
